plays.text: Penalty to Teemu Selanne 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Dominik Hasek
Goal scored by Bryan Smolinski assisted by Andrej Meszaros AND Brian Pothier
Penalty to Brian McGrattan 5 minutes for Fighting Todd Fedoruk
Penalty to Todd Fedoruk 5 minutes for Fighting Brian McGrattan
Penalty to Todd Fedoruk 2 minutes for Hooking Wade Redden
Goal scored by Patrick Eaves assisted by Bryan Smolinski
Penalty to Chris Phillips 2 minutes for Tripping Joffrey Lupul
Penalty to Zdeno Chara 2 minutes for Hooking Teemu Selanne
Goal scored by Chris Kunitz assisted by Teemu Selanne AND Andy McDonald
Penalty to Chris Kunitz 2 minutes for Tripping Anton Volchenkov
Goal scored by Teemu Selanne unassisted
Goal scored by Todd Marchant assisted by Vitaly Vishnevski AND Jonathan Hedstrom
Penalty to Chris Kelly 2 minutes for Hooking Joe DiPenta
Penalty to Ruslan Salei 2 minutes for Interference Patrick Eaves
Penalty to Brian Pothier 2 minutes for Hooking Todd Marchant
Goal scored by Dany Heatley assisted by Daniel Alfredsson
Jonathan Hedstrom shootout attempt against Dominik Hasek with a Backhand results in a SAVE!
Patrick Eaves shootout attempt against Jean-Sebastien Giguere with a Wristshot results in a SAVE!
